posts.message: Anyone has experience with JMeter? Need to make a stress test on my local for simulating 1000 concurrent user.

If you working in web app, and your database will growing by the time with huge amount of data
Wich RDBMS you preferred, oracle or sql server
in the perspective of ( optimization,  acceleration , license,  security, etc )

Guys i need your help to beta test android application 
here is the link for the app on android store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.voise.Voise 

a brief description : Voise - A simpler way to text many friends at a time.

Can any one suggest a Java Web based architecture that might have the following specs:
1- single Web page (framework?)
2- restful web services (framework?) 
3- controller needed?
4- DB access framework? Avoid jpa and hibernate 
5- application server, if any
6- is Web servers needed?
7- overview about hardware specs 
8- scalability
9- availability
